title: padhamalarE taNicham
sahitya:
paadamalarE taNYcam - amba unadu paadamalarE taNYcam

 

anupallavi



aadiyandamaRRa jananamaraNa vu-

paadiyaal medda varundinEnuk kunadu

(paadamalarE)

 

caraNam



amba enadu aRivuvanda naaLmudal

agamagizhndun naalayandORum vandu

cembonaDivaNaNGgi yaaDipoorat

tirunaaDoRu maruNaaDi yaDaindEn

SrijagadeeSwari kaayaarOhaNa

naadanmagizhum neelaayadaakshi siva

raajadaanigar vaazhumnaayagi

raajaraajESwari paramESwari

(paadamalarE)
